Milind Soman Age

58 Years Old

Biography

Family

Physical Measurements

Education

Career

In 1995, Soman appeared in Alisha Chinai’s music video “Made in India.” That same year, he made his television debut in “A Mouthful of Sky.” Later, he was featured in the Indian science fiction TV Series “Captain Vyom” and also appeared in the TV series “Sea Hawks.”

Over the years, Soman has worked in various films, including “Pachaikili Muthucharam,” “Paiyaa,” “Agni Varsha,” and “Rules: Pyaar Ka Superhit Formula,” which he also produced. He has also acted in English and foreign language films such as “Valley of Flowers,” “The Flag,” and “Arn – The Knight Templar,” where he portrayed Saladin.

In 2010, he participated in the reality show “Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 3.” He also appeared in the Amazon Prime series “Four More Shots Please” and the Alt Balaji series “Paurashpur.”

Soman’s filmography includes roles in films like “Bajirao Mastani,” “Chef,” and “Doctor.” He has also been involved in television, appearing in shows like “Ghost Bana Dost” and “India’s Next Top Model.” Additionally, he has produced shows like “MTV Rush” and served as a judge on reality shows like “MTV Supermodel of the Year.”

In terms of music videos, Soman has appeared in Alisha Chinai’s “Made in India” and other songs like “Jaanam Samjha Karo” and “Deewana.”

People Also Ask

Q1. How old is Milind Soman ?

Ans. Milind Soman was born on 4 November 1965 in Scotland, United Kingdom. As of 2024, he is 58 years old.
